title: Lead Developer / Azure DevOps
description: Empowered users with dynamic user-defined data models and custom reporting features compliant with 'Good Laboratory Practices'.
Developed web applications using ASP.Net WebForms, MVC, WebAPI, RESTful OData, and SOAP APIs powered by Oracle (nHibernate, Entity Framework, PL/SQL).
Built responsive web interfaces with CSS3, Flex Box, Bootstrap, and AngularJS.
Developed offline capabilities using WinForms and Xamarin Forms apps.
